TITLE: AI-Assisted Curriculum Design
DEF: Using generative AI to draft curricula
TASK: The AI-Assisted Curriculum Design pattern uses AI's generative capability to develop detailed curricula for various educational settings. This not only speeds up the process but also ensures that the latest pedagogical strategies are included. This can be advantageous when developing a new program or when time is of the essence. However, while AI can suggest innovative curriculum structures, the ultimate decision-making should remain with educational professionals to ensure alignment with learning objectives and regulations. The pattern's effectiveness can be maximized through continuous refinement and validation of the AI's output.
